external_homepage: Analyzing logs in Debian web server
name: log4lin
short_description:
apt-get install awstats

http://awstats.sourceforge.net/

Get:1 http://ftp.us.debian.org lenny/main awstats 6.7.dfsg-5.1+lenny1 [920kB]
Get:2 http://ftp.us.debian.org lenny/main libnet-xwhois-perl 0.90-3

nano /etc/apache2/conf.d/awstats


/usr/lib/cgi-bin# perl awstats.pl -config=localhost -update

/etc/apache2/conf.d/awstats

Alias /awstatsclasses "/usr/share/awstats/lib/"
Alias /awstats-icon/ "/usr/share/awstats/icon/"
Alias /awstatscss "/usr/share/doc/awstats/examples/css"
ScriptAlias /cgi-bin/ /usr/lib/cgi-bin/
ScriptAlias /awstats/ /usr/lib/cgi-bin/
Options ExecCGI -MultiViews +SymLinksIfOwnerMatch

http://domain.tld/awstats/awstats.pl
